DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy Glaukos Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Model GTS400 conjunction cataract surgery , compare cataract surgery , subject mild moderate open angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy GTS400 Stent Conjunction With Cataract
DOC.detailed_description: The objective trial evaluate safety efficacy Glaukos Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Model GTS400 ( hereinafter refer GTS400 ) combination cataract surgery , compare cataract surgery , subject mild moderate primary open-angle glaucoma . This prospective , randomize , concurrently control , parallel group , multicenter clinical investigation GTS400 . Treatment consist either implantation GTS400 stent study eye conjunction cataract surgery ( Group 1 , Investigational Group ) , cataract surgery ( Group 2 , Control Group ) . Clinical data 12 month postoperative form basis pre-market approval ( PMA ) submission . Subjects follow two year postoperatively .
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate OpenAngle Glaucoma specific criterion , need cataract surgery Subject willing attend schedule followup exam two year postoperatively , Subject willing provide write informed consent Institutional Review Board approve Informed Consent Form Not meet inclusion criterion
